categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones actors

nodes.text: Kyle Rowling (born September 6, 1970) is a fight director who worked on both Attack of the Clones and Revenge of the Sith. In addition to doubling for both Christopher Lee and Samuel L. Jackson during their lightsaber fight sequences, he played Joclad Danva and also wore a bluescreen and greenscreen suit to act out General Grievous's fight sequences with Ewan McGregor. Rowling has also taught Star Wars lightsaber courses at the Sydney NIDA (National Institute of Dramatic Art).[source?]
